name: HelloUniverse
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hello universe
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Our world has such an ambivalent nature; full of tragedy and wonder all at once. Hello Universe aims to focus on the latter, offering a bit of respite to listeners in the form of short frequently updated news aggregations. Nothing's 'off limits', but the focus of the Hello Universe reports is on space, exploration, and continuing human development/advancement.

WHAT YOU CAN DO:

Say "report" for the latest Hello Universe report. Due to the nature of how the Alexa skill is set up the skill will automatically close after a report, so you'll need to re-open Hello Universe if you want to do other things.

Say "space fact" for a random space factoid.

Say "about" to know more about Hello Universe itself.

Other invocations like "Repeat", "Help", "Stop" are also supported.

You can learn more about Hello Universe at https://hellouniverse.space and follow along at https://twitter.com/oh_hey_universe
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
